mapper.select: SELECT c.`id` AS `classId`, c.`name` AS `className`, c.`is_end_class` `isEndClass`, l.`cover` AS `lessonCover`, l.`id` AS `lessonId`, l.`name` AS `lessonName` FROM `edu_lesson_class_stu` s, `edu_lesson_class` c, `edu_lesson` l WHERE s.`stu_id` = #{userId} AND s.`lesson_class_id` = c.`id` AND c.`is_deleted` = 0 AND c.`lesson_id` = l.id AND l.`is_deleted` = 0 ORDER BY s.`create_time` DESC
